name: Oh ship, here we go again ! - TEAM 23
name_original: Oh ship, here we go again ! - TEAM 23
description:
TheGodFatherJam is back ! 3 days to create a game draft using discord with our teammates ! This year, Game Artists, Game Designers, Game Programmers and Producers gathered around famous quotes from movies which inspired their games. No quote could have been more thrilling than the tensed sentence: “Houston, we have a problem” from the movie Apollo 13 !

Pitch:

Exploration is always filled up with unknown. And when we think about space, unknown often refers to an Alien that expresses his hospitality by laying an egg in your stomach. But with Apollo 13, the only thing that wants you dead is your ship. Indeed, a technical error is all it takes to send you crashing into an asteroid. The error you get ? Unknown. When will it get repaired? Unknown. Can you still navigate through those asteroids ? I hope for you that you can!

With each crash your ship gets damaged, making it more difficult to maneuver. Adapt is your only solution in this endless runner that pulls you out of your comfort zone.   

Tutorial :

You can move your ship around by using the ZQSD keys.

Your ship will be subjected to regular technical problems. Some will happen naturally, unlike the others which can only happen if you hit an asteroid.

 

Meet the team !

 I am sure you are curious about the talented people that hide behind the game.

You like the ship design and how fast you feel around those asteroids ?

You can thanks the Game Artists Martin Arribard and Terence Thellier.

You can’t find tranquility around these collisions shaking your game! That is exactly what the Game Programmers had in mind. If you want redemption, I let you find their address but I am generous, I’ll give you their name: Theo Driutti, Amaury Mehlman and Hector Brun.

I am sure you are as happy with this game experience as they were to design it for you. Let Marie Wajsblat and Simon Dialinas know about it !

They did their best to have the game ready on time and keep track of the priorities. The product managers Victor Hamcha and Thomas Brochard led the team to this exciting result !  

A special thanks to Clémence Gueidan and Jérôme Audo for their precious feedbacks and inputs.

 

Less talk and more gaming, download the game below :
